roleset.name: assign to a specific purpose

example.name: passive
example.text: Traders credited Euro Disney 's share performance to the tremendous hyping of the project that the shares are destined [*-1] to help finance [*T*]: Walt Disney Co. 's 4,800-acre theme park 20 miles east of Paris .

roleset.note: DESTINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'destine' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from destine.01-v predicate notes)
